price: (6) For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
arabic: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: laysa lahum ṭaʿāmun illā min ḍarīʿin
